text: Gary Brown (born 29 October 1985) is an English former professional footballer. ==Court case== Gary was found guilty of drunken behaviour at Blackburn Magistrates Court on 18 December 2008 after using threatening behaviour towards a policeman whilst drunk on a Darwen football pitch. He was ordered to do 150 hours community service and fined £100. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:People from Darwen Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Runcorn Linnets F.C. players Category:A.F.C. Darwen players Category:Association football defenders
title: Gary Brown (footballer)
